summary: Eye-pleasing dark blue scheme based on Underwater colorscheme
name: underwater-mod
description:
Underwater-mod is a mod of Underwater [1]. Colors for NERDTree, Ruby, ERB, HAML and HTML elements are assigned. Tweaks to general colors, like vertical split, give Vim a simpler appearance.  See screenshot [2] which uses Consolas font.

[1] http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2977
[2] http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/8104/screenshot20100623at319.png
install_details:
Dowload. From terminal, copy the file to colors folder:
  cp ~/Downloads/underwater-mod.vim ~/.vim/colors

Using pathogen? https://github.com/mgutz/vim-colors

In vim, use the color scheme:
  :colo underwater-mod

versions.release_notes:
* private/public Ruby access
* less overpowering TODO
* help documents fix 
* markdown changes for syntax: http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1242
* HAML tag
* Tab colors
